comment: * Information about a particular app op.

variables.name: code
variables.comment: * A unique constant identifying this app op.

variables.name: switchCode
variables.comment:
* This maps each operation to the operation that serves as the
     * switch to determine whether it is allowed.  Generally this is
     * a 1:1 mapping, but for some things (like location) that have
     * multiple low-level operations being tracked that should be
     * presented to the user as one switch then this can be used to
     * make them all controlled by the same single operation.

variables.name: name
variables.comment: * This maps each operation to the public string constant for it.

variables.name: simpleName
variables.comment:
* This provides a simple name for each operation to be used
     * in debug output.

variables.name: permission
variables.comment:
* This optionally maps a permission to an operation.  If there
     * is no permission associated with an operation, it is null.

variables.name: restriction
variables.comment:
* Specifies whether an Op should be restricted by a user restriction.
     * Each Op should be filled with a restriction string from UserManager or
     * null to specify it is not affected by any user restriction.

variables.name: allowSystemRestrictionBypass
variables.comment:
* In which cases should an app be allowed to bypass the
     * {@link AppOpsManager#setUserRestriction user restriction} for a certain app-op.

variables.name: defaultMode
variables.comment: * This specifies the default mode for each operation.

variables.name: disableReset
variables.comment:
* This specifies whether each option is allowed to be reset
     * when resetting all app preferences.  Disable reset for
     * app ops that are under strong control of some part of the
     * system (such as OP_WRITE_SMS, which should be allowed only
     * for whichever app is selected as the current SMS app).

variables.name: restrictRead
variables.comment:
* This specifies whether each option is only allowed to be read
     * by apps with privileged appops permission.

variables.name: forceCollectNotes
variables.comment: * Whether to collect noteOp instances, and send them to callbacks.
